name: Pong-O-Twist
description:
Play The Classical Pong But With Powerups

This is a replica of the classical pong game but after every 5 streaks, a new powerup popup appears on the screen. Interact with it and win against your opponent. This is a 2-Player game which can be played on the same screen with 1 Keyboard only.

This is short mini-game project with properties changing and timer to keep track of the powerups was created as an attempt to learn more about game development and Godot.
